definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Dian4 li4 Jian1 guan3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: A few items. For starters, there are regulatory concerns.
sentences.chinese: 有那么几处首先是监管的问题。

sentences.english: Dubai sorely lacked such oversight in the run-up to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 在走向破产的道路上，迪拜非常缺乏这样的监管。
对于过度监管的担忧消失了。

sentences.english: Its new resolution authority allows the regulator significant access to systemically relevant firms.
sentences.chinese: 新决议授权监管机构可以有效介入公司相关系统。

sentences.english: Lehman Brothers was a symptom of a dysfunctional financial system and regulatory failure.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟是异化的金融系统和监管失败的症状。

sentences.english: Using analysis method of games theory to expound the supervision and management to power supervision and management committee.
sentences.chinese: 运用博弈论分析方法阐述对电监会的监管。

sentences.english: But supervisors are stopping short of slamming on the brakes.
sentences.chinese: 但是监管者此举师出无名。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Processing Zone is a special area supervised by customhouse.
sentences.chinese: 第三条加工区是海关监管的特定区域。

sentences.english: Timely deployment of work safety, strict implementation of territorial regulatory responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 及时研究部署安全生产工作，严格落实属地监管责任。

sentences.english: Yesterday, city industrial and commercial bureau was announced electronic business affairs superintended a circumstance last year.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，市工商局公布了去年电子商务监管情况。

sentences.english: We strengthened regulation and oversight of thereal estatemarket to improve the mix of market housing available.
sentences.chinese: 加强房地产市场调控和监管，着力调整住房供给结构。
你必须监管你的生产力。

sentences.english: We must rationalize our regulatory system. The regulator must have the capacity to regulate comprehensive services.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须理顺监管体制。

sentences.english: Why simply punish CIA lackeys, rather than those who oversaw them?
sentences.chinese: 为什么只惩罚中情局的底层人员而非其监管者呢？

sentences.english: The picture shows Customs officers making supervision on the ship entering into territory.
sentences.chinese: 图为关员对进境船舶实施监管。

definition: China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]
China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), abbr. for 中國保險監督管理委員會|中国保险监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
